<h1 align="center">
Joyn Platform
</h1>

Joyn is a whatsApp clone project that simulate the flow of WhatsApp web.

## ðŸ“¢ Please Note

**We don't have copyrights, patent or franchaise towards the WhatsApp application. We're developing JOYN all in the name of improving our skills. Therefore, the intention of making something out this application which idealy is not our original idea, is NOT our motive. Lastly, this project is an opensource for any newbie that want to get started putting work on Gatsby, Typescript and Tailwindcss.** 

## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Clone the project and start developing.**

    Navigate into your new siteâ€™s directory and start it up.

    ```zsh
    git clone https://github.com/mmsesay/joyn
    cd joyn/
    gatsby develop
    ```

1.  **Open the source code and start editing!**

    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!
